title: realme 9 5G SE (Starry Glow, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Cable, Sim Card Tool, Screen Protect Film, Case, Important Info Booklet with Warranty Card, Quick Guide
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Mic, Noise Reduction, Dirac Effect, Hi-Res Audio Certification
product_specification.Other Display Features: 144 Hz Refresh Rate, Aspect Ratio: 20.1:9, Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.80%, Screen Contrast: 1500:1, Brightness: 480 nit, Color Saturation: 96%, Supports Sunlight Screen
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 48MP Main Camera (Samsung S5KGM1ST, f/1.8 (Optics: f/1.79) Aperture, FOV: 79.8 Degree, Focal Length: 25.4 mm, 6P Lens, 1/2 inch Sensor Size, 0.8 um Pixel Size, PDAF) + 2MP Black and White (GalaxyCore GC02M1B, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, Focal Length: 21.8 mm, 3P Lens, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, Fixed Focus) + 2MP Micro (GalaxyCore GC02M1, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, Focal Length: 21.8 mm, 3P Lens, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, 4cm Fixed Focus), Camera Feature: 48M Mode, Super Nightscape, Panoramic, Professional, Timelapse Photography, Video Background Bokeh, Portrait, HDR, Super Mircro, AI Scene Recognition, AI Beauty Filter, Filters, Colorful Mode, Hypertext, Portrait Distortion Correction, Tilt Shift, AI ID Photo, Flash, Flash Lighting, 20 Pics Continous Shooting, CMOS, Video Feature: AI Video, Video Stabilize, Video Bokeh, Video Beauty Fillter, Video Shooting, Video Zoom-In, Multi View Video Shooting, EIS and UIS Video Stabilization
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: Sony IMX471, f/2.1 (Optics: f/2.05) Aperture, FOV: 79.3 Degree, 1/3.09 inch Sensor Size, 1.0 um Pixel Size, 5P Lens, Fixed Focus, Camera Feature: Front Camera Profile Bokeh, Timelapse Photography, Front Camera Panoramic, Beauty Filter, HDR, Face Identification, Filter, Front Camera Shooting Filp, Front Camera Super Nightscape, Front Camera Shooting Bokeh Modification, AI ID Photo, CMOS, UIS and EIS Video Stabilization
product_specification.Flash: Rear: Single Flash | Front: Screen Flash
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 4K (at 30 fps), 1080p (at 60 fps/30fps), 720p (at 60 fps/30 fps), 1080p (at 120 fps), 720p (at 240 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Wi-Fi Version: IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax (WiFi 4, WiFi 5, WiFi 6) (2.4 GHz | 5 GHz)
product_specification.Sensors: Magnetic Induction Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyro-meter, Acceleration Sensor, Fingerprint Sensor
product_specification.Supported Languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Filipino, French, Indonesia, Malaysia, Vietnamese, Russian, Uyghur, Arabic, Kazakh, Nepali, Hindi, Bengali, Thai, Lao, Tibetan Language, Burmese, Cambodian, Korean
product_specification.Other Features: 144 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, COG Sealing Process, In-cell Touch Panel Technology, 10 Touch Points, Back Cover Material: Plastic, Back Cover Technology: Ink + Spray Coating Matte, Glass Type: Panda Glass (MN228, 2.5 D), Taking Photos Methods: Screen Touchm Volume, Countdown, RAM Channel: Dual Channel, RAM Frequency: 2133 MHz, ROM Type: UFS 2.2, ROM Channel: Dual Channel, Supports FAT, NTFS, FAT32, EXFAT Format, 30W Max Charging Power, VOOC 30W PD 3.0 15W, Reverse Charging, Reverse Charging Power: 5V 500mA, WiFi Antenna Technology: 2 x 2 MIMO, RF Antenna Technology: 4 x 4 MIMO, Bluetooth Audio Codec: SBC, AAC, APTX, APTX HD, APTX-TWS+, LDAC, Phone Locked Functions: Face Unlock, Finger Unlock, Password Unlock, Image Unlock, Wet Fingerprint Unlock, Face Unlock Technology, Number Identification, File Encryption, Private Space, Private Apps, Private Protection, OTG Storage Format: FAT32, NTFS, EXFAT, 2 Microphone, Vibrating Motor Type: Rotor Motor, 1 Speaker, Heat Dissipation Technology: Heat Pipe + Graphite, Supports L3 Level WideVine, Press to Answer Calls, Wake Up Voice Assistant, Switch the Music, Headphones Monitor, Kids Space, Off Screen Clock/AOD, Night Shiled, Step Tracker, Game Space, App Market, Theme Store, Clone Phone, Phone Manager, Telephone Number Identification, Wallet, Data Backup, Office Tools, Files Compression and Decompression, World time
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, AGPS, BEIDOU, GLONASS, QZSS, GALILEO
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, APE, FLAC, AMR, MID, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA, MKA
product_specification.Video Formats: MP4, 3GP, ASF, AVI, FLV, M2TS, MKV, MPG, TS, WEBM, WMV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.Snapdragon Advantage: Thanks to the Snapdragon 778G 5G Processor, a 6 nm architecture, and a 6th generation AI engine, the realme 9 5G SE delivers a powerful mix of speed and unparalleled performance, offering the essential dependability of smooth operation.
product_description.Game On: With a 144 Hz Adaptive Gaming Screen and a 6-level variable refresh rate your gaming sessions are sure to get more intense. Furthermore, matching the peripheral system requirements is made easy so that you can have a seamless gaming stint.
product_description.Lightening-fast Charging: With a 5000 mAh battery, 30 W Rapid Charging technology, and a comprehensive five core protection system, you can charge your phone quickly and use it throughout the day, taking advantage of its unrivalled performance when gaming, streaming, and more.
product_description.Dynamic RAM: The realme 9 5G SE has Dynamic RAM Expansion Technology, which allows you to increase its RAM capacity by affixing up to 5 GB of virtual RAM to your smartphone, improving its productivity and operational convenience.
product_description.Unique Design: The Starlight Texture Design's nano-coating technology of this phone, not only delivers a delicate touch but also improves anti-fingerprint performance, keeping your phone smudge-free while giving an incomparable visual delight.
product_description.Click Memories: The AI-powered 48 MP camera captures spectacular memories and enables you to capture fascinating shots with great visual quality even in dim-lit conditions.
product_description.Fingerprint Sensor: The power switch on this smartphone functions wonderfully with fingerprint detection, enabling you to access your device almost immediately in addition to providing improved security to your phone.
product_description.Robust Storage: Thanks to its powerful storage that boasts a huge RAM and up to 128GB of internal storage. You can multitask and juggle between applications with ease making this phone an optimal device for storing both your personal and work-related data.

review:
No wide angle camera❌❌, camera clarity is descent.
1 hr fast charging
I prefer Lcd, so display is good, 144hz✅
Extended memory ✅
Sd778g Good performance ✅
Good battery backup✅
Realme ui✅
Inshort, a budget gaming beast.

Daylight camera is excellent
Lightweight
Smooth Display because of good refresh rate and sound quality is good
Battery charging time is 45-50 min, one day backup once full charged
Build quality is ok because of plastic, doesn't feel very handy

Camera is excellent 4.4 out of 5
Display is too good 4.6 out of 5
Look is so good 4.8 out of 5
Overall it is the best budget smartphone 4.8 out of 5
Battery backup is also too good

Im fully satisfied with this mobile....it had everything a perfect mobile needs to be!.....the experience of 144Hz refresh rate was awesome!..... camera is perfect at it point , it takes awesome photos, and its 1080p , 60 fps video recording is literally 🔥🔥🔥.....loved it 💝...and the most thing im impressed with !....it supports bgmi graphics on smooth with extreme and HDR with ultra😍😍😍 i just want to thank realme for providing gaming beast, camera beast, smoother display at this price segment 💖

It totally justifies its name 'Speed edition'
The display was soo smooth earlier my primary driver was redmi note 7 but after three years I decided to buy a new handset
In big saving days i thought I should buy realme gt master edition but trust me except the back of special voyager grey edition and amoled display rest all is same it's a kind a blessing in disguise😝 that I not able to bought master edition in the sale
If you are the one who's first priority is perfomance trust me man you will not get 778g and 144hz in any other phone at this price you should definitely check this out 🤓

The phone performance is good. And the day to day usability and looks are quite good. The only problem that I found was the rear camera clearity is poor and no wide angle camera. And the front camera take unreal and beauty mode pics. Which cannot be disabled. If you are a camera enthusiastic person stay away. Otherwise very good device of BGMI players and normal users.

Amazing phone
Having great processor and camera is also decent enough screen colour is also good far better then many of its competitors phone

Night photos are also amazing

Go for it

Realme 9 SE is very good phone in my opinion, I am using it and I am very much satisfied. Those who are complaining about camera, I can say Realme optimised very well and it takes better photos than Iqoo Z5, also can shoot 4k 30fps with EIS. Performance is awesome and in the end Realme UI is far better than crappy Funtouch os.

Absolute beast, daylight camera is awesome. In night camera struggles a bit. For gaming it's butter smooth, though it's not having super amoled display still brightness is really high. Display color reproduction is also good. Battery backup is good & dart charger works very fast for charging.

Performance very good with sd 778g
Battery backup is good with 1 hr charging
Camera good
Overall nice performance mobile
